body_html: I think it has to do with the Dual GPU architecture for Tesla K80. It has a PCIe switch to communicate both GPU cards internally. It shall introduce an overhead on communication. See block diagram
body_text: I think it has to do with the Dual GPU architecture for Tesla K80. It has a PCIe switch to communicate both GPU cards internally. It shall introduce an overhead on communication. See block diagram
body: I think it has to do with the Dual GPU architecture for Tesla K80. It has a PCIe switch to communicate both GPU cards internally. It shall introduce an overhead on communication. See [block diagram](https://www.microway.com/hpc-tech-tips/introducing-nvidia-tesla-k80-gpu-accelerator-kepler-gk210/)
